mapper.select: select buhinId from buhin ORDER BY buhinId DESC limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into buhin(kikiSysId, kikiId, kikiBunrui, kikiBunruiSeq, buhinKbn, BuhinSeq, asbKbn, buhinzuBikou, buhinMei, hyojunSiyou, siyouKasyo, sizaiName, hinban, makerRyaku, maker, sunpou ,bikou, suryo, imageId, trkDate, updDate) values( #{kikiSysId}, #{kikiId}, #{kikiBunrui}, #{kikiBunruiSeq}, #{buhinKbn}, #{BuhinSeq}, #{asbKbn}, #{buhinzuBikou}, #{buhinMei}, #{hyojunSiyou}, #{siyouKasyo}, #{sizaiName}, #{hinban}, #{makerRyaku}, #{maker}, #{sunpou}, #{bikou}, #{suryo}, #{imageId}, #{trkDate}, #{updDate} )
mapper.update: update buhin set buhinKbn=#{buhinKbn}, buhinSeq=#{buhinSeq}, asbKbn=#{asbKbn}, buhinzuBikou=#{buhinzuBikou}, buhinMei=#{buhinMei}, hyojunSiyou=#{hyojunSiyou}, siyouKasyo=#{siyouKasyo}, sizaiName=#{sizaiName}, hinban=#{hinban}, makerRyaku=#{makerRyaku}, maker=#{maker}, sunpou=#{sunpou}, bikou=#{bikou}, suryo=#{suryo}, imageId=#{imageId}, updDate=#{updDate} where buhinId=#{buhinId}
